controls.caption: RGB result
controls.description:
If cleared, the result will be 1-channel grayscale matrix, corresponding to visual intensity (brightness) of the source one.
If set, the result will be RGB matrix with identical R,G,B components, equal to the result of this function without this flag. Such an image is 3-channel, but looks actually gray.
controls.name: rgbResult

controls.caption: Requires input
controls.name: inputRequired
controls.description: If set, the input port must contain some initialized matrix; in another case, this function will throw an exception. If this flag is cleared, empty input port doesn't lead to any effect: output port will still stay empty.
